system.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 50% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 7. If a @Affliction[burn] target would be @Affliction[burn] by this attack, they also gain @Affliction[suppressed] 5.

actions.name: Sacred Fire
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 50% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 7. If a target whom is already suffering from the Burn affliction would be burned by this attack, they instead have @Affliction[char] 5 applied.
